verses.name: Genesis 37:34
verses.text: And Jacob rent his clothes, and put sackcloth upon his loins, and mourned for his son many days.

verses.name: Genesis 37:35
verses.text: And all his sons and all his daughters rose up to comfort him; but he refused to be comforted; and he said, For I will go down into the grave unto my son mourning. Thus his father wept for him.

verses.name: Genesis 37:36
verses.text: And the Midianites sold him into Egypt unto Potiphar, an officer of Pharaoh’s, and captain of the guard.
